QuestData.Title: Staying Connected
QuestData.Description: The Tongue of Ba-Shon should allow us to communicate from long distances, $n.$b$bIf the relic works the way I think it will, I should be able to stay here and continue my meditations while you do some scouting in the Valley of Emperors.$b$bMishi will take you to the edge of the valley so that we can test my theory. I would hate for you to be in the tombs with no way to contact me. That would be horrible!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Tongue of Ba-Shon in the Valley of Emperors.
QuestData.RewardText: Very good! The relic works!$b$bIt appears there is more going on in the Valley of Emperors than I had anticipated. It is crucial we figure out why the Mogu are opening the tombs.

Objectives.Objective: Use the Tongue of Ba-Shon in the Valley of Emperors
